AGw.caption: NFT Contract Address
AGw.doc: The NFT msmart contract address this NFT will be minted from.
AGw.name: nft_contract_address

AGx.caption: Name
AGx.doc: The name of the NFT being minted. This cannot be changed after minting, and will be visable when viewing this NFT on NFT marketplaces such as Opensea or Rarible.
AGx.name: name

AGy.caption: Description
AGy.doc: The description of the NFT being minted. This cannot be changed after minting, and will be visable when viewing this NFT on NFT marketplaces such as Opensea or Rarible.
AGy.name: description

AGz.caption: Image
AGz.doc: The image of the NFT being minted. This cannot be changed after minting, and will be visable when viewing this NFT on NFT marketplaces such as Opensea or Rarible.This can be the value of an image uploader, or an IPFS link formatted as: ipfs://<CID>
AGz.name: image

AHA.caption: Total Supply
AHA.doc: The total supply of this given NFT. This is unique to ERC-1155 NFTs.
AHA.name: total_supply

AHB.caption: NFT Receiver
AHB.doc: The wallet address that will receive the NFT once its minted.
AHB.name: to_address
